articles.author: Steven Goff
articles.title: Twila Kilgore named interim USWNT coach; Vlatko Andonovski departs - The Washington Post
articles.description: Kilgore, who served on Vlatko Andonovski’s staff the past 18 months, will guide the USWNT in friendlies against South Africa next month.
articles.content:

Twila Kilgore has been named interim coach of the U.S. womens national soccer team, replacing Vlatko Andonovski, who on Thursday announced his departure following the … [+3831 chars]
